message.body: Was sip?
Wassup*

not a whole lot. doing laundry. making to-do lists. leaving early wednesday for vegas->az.
wassup with you?
NM. Just sitting around pouting, nothing real new
How long u leavin town for

pouting about what, baby? what's going on?
about 2 weeks. family shit. niece's bat mitzvah. seeing some friends. meeting up w/ the producer to start talking about pre-production.
visiting pops on the way back.
Oooh cool beans that sounds like a lot of positive fun stuff
i dunno. got some ugly stuff to do there too. gotta tell a chick there i don't want her. we got friends in common. gonna be rough.
my buddy, chris, is super depressed. staying with him. gonna be a lot of therapy/counseling time. happy to do it, but still a drag.
just sayin' it's not all roses.
Never is
nope. ;-)
what happen to ichi?
are YOU okay?
Crying a good bit
She got her ass beat by something
Several puncture wounds and one big chunk of skin torn off
It looked like they weren't that bad at first but when they were cleaning the wound more skin sloughed off and it was bigger than they thought
She has to spend night at hospital and get stitched up
omg! fuck! the vet is hopeful atleast...right?
i'm soooo sorry, baby.
ichi's gonna be okay...
Yeah they said she'll be fine they were really nice i just hope she wasn't lying to me cuz she could tell I was trying not to freak out
faith...
Yeah I think she'll b ok I just feel bad
yeah. i totally understand.
Ichi's home ! She's gonna be ok
youch! glad she's home!
Me too. :-). I loveses ma kittehs
